title: Decisions
creator_credit: CRM Educational Films and Stephen Judson
brief_description: Covers a variety of situations requiring decision-making ranging from the simple to the complex. Outlines practical procedures and psychological aspects such as anxiety, self-doubt and the fear of being wrong. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
